title: Keyword
description: The `Keyword` schema describes a keyword with specific locale and importance.

xdm:value.title: Value
xdm:value.description: The keyword itself. A keyword can be considered like a tag, i.e. a short description of the content of the asset.

xdm:localeCode.description: Language of the keyword. The locale code should follow [RFC BCP 47](https://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

xdm:importance.title: Importance
xdm:importance.description: The importance of the keyword on a scale from zero to one. If required repository will infer it as per its policies and add it for the keywords
